metadata.genres: [rnb, Canadian, soul, Alternative R&B, Alternative Rap]
metadata.bio: slchld (pronounced “Seoul child”), whose birth name is 장두혁 (Doo Hyuk Jang), is an alternative R&B artist and producer. Originally born in Seoul, South Korea he is based in Vancouver, Canada. He made his debut with as long as you’re okay EP in June 2018. He then followed up with his first full album, troubles, in July.

tracks: you won't be there for me

youtube_videos.title: you won't be there for me
